name: Conscious Computer Model
description: A model that aims to replicate the capabilities of the human brain, including learning, perception, and reasoning.
algorithm: A combination of machine learning, neuroscience, and artificial intelligence

sensory data.description: Real-world sensory data, such as images, sounds, and touch

internal states.description: The model's current internal states, such as its beliefs, memories, and goals

actions.description: The model's actions in the real world, such as movements, speech, and decisions

internal updates.description: Changes to the model's internal states, such as updates to beliefs, memories, and goals

advanced sensor technology.description: Advanced sensors that can collect a wide range of real-world data

powerful computing infrastructure.description: Powerful computing infrastructure to support the model's complex computations
